title: My store is blank and also i did not receive teemoing gift icon after i did so
body: My store is blank not black screen but as it doesnt open even after i have repaired redownloaded did tsl and ssl 3 thing im wondering what do i need to do for my store to open even after getting alpha client also i have not received the alpha client icon (ill wait long if need be) but the main icon im missing is the gift icon pumpkin from the teemoing event after i gifted a while back

replies.body:
You may have a poor connection specifically to the store servers. I'd recommend going through our connection guide to ensure your local network settings are configured correctly for League.

As for the icons, we're still sending those out, so sit tight until we can get those out to you. Specifically for the teemoing pumpkin icon, if you don't have it by the 18th, let us know in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know how those connection steps went.
